alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:53AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 130 AM CDT... At 1252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Alexandria to near Mahaska. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairbury, Plymouth, Endicott, Jansen, Reynolds, Steele City, Alexandria State Recreation Area, Rock Creek Station State Historical Park, Cub Creek Recreational Area, Crystal Springs Campground, Buckley Creek Recreational Area, Camp Jefferson, and Gladstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
